name: CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF
description: This table contains the provider supplemental summary information for the remittance record.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record with related remit claim references.

columns.name: TOT_DRG_AMT
columns.description: This is the total diagnosis related group amount for the remittance record.

columns.name: FED_AMT
columns.description: This is the total federal-specific amount for the remittance record.

columns.name: HOSP_AMT
columns.description: This is the total hospital-specific amount for the remittance record.

columns.name: DISP_SHARE_AMT
columns.description: This is the total disproportionate share amount for the remittance record.

columns.name: TOT_CAP_AMT
columns.description: This is the total capital amount for the remittance record.

columns.name: MED_EDU_AMT
columns.description: This is the total indirect medical education amount for the remittance record.

columns.name: TOT_OUT_DAY_CNT
columns.description: This is the total number of outlier days for the remittance record.

columns.name: DAY_OUT_AMT
columns.description: This is the total day outlier amount for the remittance record.

columns.name: COST_OUT_AMT
columns.description: This is the total cost outlier amount for the remittance record.

columns.name: AVG_DRG_LEN_STAY
columns.description: This is the diagnosis related group (DRG) average length of stay for the remittance record.

columns.name: TOT_DISCHARGE_CNT
columns.description: This is the total number of discharges for the remittance record.

columns.name: COST_REP_DAY_CNT
columns.description: This is the total number of cost report days for the remittance record.

columns.name: CVRD_DAY_CNT
columns.description: This is the total number of covered days for the remittance record.

columns.name: NONCVRD_DAY_CNT
columns.description: This is the total number of non-covered days for the remittance record.

columns.name: MSP_PASS_THRU_AMT
columns.description: This is the total Medicare Secondary Payer (MSP) pass- through amount calculated for a non-Medicare payer for the remittance record.

columns.name: AVG_DRG_WEIGHT
columns.description: This is the average diagnosis-related group (DRG) weight for the remittance record.

columns.name: PPS_CAP_FSP_DRG_AM
columns.description: This is the total prospective payment system (PPS) capital, federal-specific portion, diagnosis-related group (DRG) amount for the remittance record.

columns.name: PPS_CAP_HSP_DRG
columns.description: This is the total prospective payment system (PPS) capital, hospital-specific portion, diagnosis-related group (DRG) amount for the remittance record.

columns.name: TOT_PPS_DSH_DRG_AM
columns.description: This is the total prospective payment system (PPS) disproportionate share, hospital diagnosis-related group (DRG) amount for the remittance record.
